Animal Abundance Level.Description: Determines how many animals can appear and whether there should be certain conditions to be met. High and Low: Does not have any unlock conditions and slightly affects spawn chances, Vanilla: Some animals have certain conditions that need to be met before they start appearing.

Allow Custom Events.Description: A small chance for custom nightly events that either spawn random objects in your farm or give the player custom buffs if enabled.

Allow Junimo sprite changes.Description: Junimos spawned in the Community Center/in-game cutscenes could use random Junimo sprites provided by this mod if toggled on. Toggled off will keep the junimo sprites unchanged in the community center and cutscenes.

Allow WA Junimo sprite changes.Description: Toggle on if you want the Junimos spawned by the Wild Animals mod to use a random set of junimo sprites. Toggling it off if you want to keep using your own personal junimo sprites.

Give Junimos Leaf Umbrellas.Description: Junimos will hold leaf umbrellas when it's raining outside if toggled on.

Raccoon Colors.Description: Chooses the color of the raccoons spawned from this mod. 'Vanilla' matches the raccoons in the vanilla game, while 'Original' is the old colors that Wild Animals' raccoons came with.

Allow Aquatic Animals.Description: Certain animals have a chance to spawn in several bodies of water if enabled.

Allow Bonus Animals.Description: A collection of random creatures that are added in just for fun . Most (if not all) have a smaller chance of spawning in the random, somewhat hidden places chosen for them.

Allow Festive Animals.Description: Certain animals have a chance to spawn in certain maps depending on the near festival dates if enabled.

Allow Wild Animals In Custom Areas.Description: Certain animals may spawn in custom areas added from other mods if enabled.

Allow Wild Animals In Farm.Description: Certain animals have a 30% chance to spawn in your farm if enabled.

Allow Wild Animals In Island Farm.Description: Certain animals may spawn in your island farm if enabled.

Load Wild Animals.AllowValues: Armadillos, Badgers + Wolverines, Bears, Beavers, Boars, Bobcats, Coyotes, Crows, Deers, Ducks, Fennec Foxes, Foxes, Geese, Gembirds, Horses, Lemurs, Monkeys, Ostriches, Owls, Peafowls, Pelicans + Seagulls, Platypuses, Quails, Quokkas, Raccoons, Otters, Skunks, Swans, Tortoises, Turtles, Wolves, Wombats
Load Wild Animals.Default: Armadillos, Badgers + Wolverines, Bears, Beavers, Boars, Bobcats, Coyotes, Crows, Deers, Ducks, Fennec Foxes, Foxes, Geese, Gembirds, Horses, Lemurs, Monkeys, Ostriches, Owls, Peafowls, Pelicans + Seagulls, Platypuses, Quails, Quokkas, Raccoons, Otters, Skunks, Swans, Tortoises, Turtles, Wolves, Wombats

Load Aquatic Animals.AllowValues: Axolotls, Crustaceans, Dolphins, Eels, Jellyfishes, MoonlightJellies, Salamanders, SeaHorses, SeaUrchins, Starfishes
Load Aquatic Animals.Default: Axolotls, Crustaceans, Dolphins, Eels, Jellyfishes, MoonlightJellies, Salamanders, SeaHorses, SeaUrchins, Starfishes

Load Wild Critters.AllowValues: Bearded Dragons, Beetles, Chinchillas, Crabs, Frogs + Toads, Grasshoppers, Hedgehogs, Iguanas, Jerboas, Lizards, Meerkats, Opossums, Pine Martens, Rabbits, Rats, Roaches, Roadrunners, Snails, Squirrels + Chipmunks, Weasels + Ferrets
Load Wild Critters.Default: Bearded Dragons, Beetles, Chinchillas, Crabs, Frogs + Toads, Grasshoppers, Hedgehogs, Iguanas, Jerboas, Lizards, Meerkats, Opossums, Pine Martens, Rabbits, Rats, Roaches, Roadrunners, Snails, Squirrels + Chipmunks, Weasels + Ferrets

Coordinates (Backwoods).Description: Sets the coordinates of the wild animals visiting the farm near the backwoods.

Coordinates (BusStop).Description: Sets the coordinates of the wild animals visiting the farm near the bus stop.

Coordinates (Forest).Description: Sets the coordinates of the wild animals visiting the farm near the forest.
